message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. After much consideration and contemplation, it is with a heavy heart that I tender my resignation from [Company Name]. Please consider this letter as formal notice effective two weeks after the submission of this email. My last day at work will be on [Last Working Day - typically 14 days/one month in advance], consistent with our company policy regarding voluntary departures.

During my tenure here, I have valued and appreciated all that we've accomplished together as a team while working towards common goals both within the organization and across various projects. The experiences gained from this time spent under your leadership were truly invaluable to me personally and professionally; it has been an honor serving at [Company Name].

I am immensely grateful for every opportunity I've had here, which allowed room for my skills development as well as the chance to make meaningful contributions. The relationships built with colleagues during this time are something that will remain long after leaving our workspace; they hold a special place in my heart and memories of countless shared experiences continue to resonate within me even today.

I am aware there might be some tasks pending at hand before I leave, which would need attention from the team members or other staff who could help facilitate an easy transition for all parties involved; please feel free reach out should you have any specific requirements in this regard – it's crucial that everyone remains on track after my departure.

Thank you once again for providing me with such a wonderful environment to work and grow within, as well as the opportunity I had been given throughout these years at [Company Name]. Rest assured there will be no hard feelings; indeed quite the opposite - it's bittersweet leaving behind what has become one of my most cherished professional memories.

I would like us all to keep in touch and look forward to meeting for coffee or lunch someday soon as a way to catch up on each other’s lives outside work hours too! Feel free reaching out via email anytime regarding future opportunities which may arise - I'm always eager learn about new ventures within this field.

With best regards,
[Your Name]
